attributes.action: All football clubs must have at least 51% fan ownership
attributes.additional_details: To many football clubs are turning into businesses and the fans are the ones losing out
attributes.background: So make it illegal for any professional and semi professional football clubs to be owned by a business or sole know more than 49%, so fans will always own at least 51% making the fans the majority shareholder

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/583310
